trans-unit.source: Defines a mechanism for retrieving a service contract from a component.
trans-unit.target: Define un mecanismo para recuperar un contrato de servicio de un componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract> interface defines a contract that enables a component to obtain a custom service that is defined by another component.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract> interfaz define un contrato que permite que un componente obtener un servicio personalizado definido por otro componente.

trans-unit.source: A component that implements <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract> is known as a service provider.
trans-unit.target: Un componente que implementa <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract> se conoce como un proveedor de servicios.

trans-unit.source: Service providers implement the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract.QueryService%2A> method to return an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract> that implements a service.
trans-unit.target: Implementan proveedores de servicios la <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract.QueryService%2A> método para devolver un <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract> que implementa un servicio.

trans-unit.source: The name of the service that is being requested.
trans-unit.target: Nombre del servicio que se solicita.

trans-unit.source: The service contract that is being requested.
trans-unit.target: Contrato de servicio que se solicita.

trans-unit.source: Returns a service contract that is implemented by this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un contrato de servicio implementado por <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract" /> that represents a service contract that a client is requesting from the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract" />; <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract" /> does not implement the requested contract.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract" /> que representa un contrato de servicio que un cliente solicita de <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract" />; <see langword="null" /> si <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract" /> no implementa el contrato solicitado.

trans-unit.source: The formats of the strings that identify services and service contracts are defined by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Los formatos de las cadenas que identifican los servicios y contratos de servicio definidos por el <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract> implementación.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract> implementations identify a service contract by the <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A> property of the type that implements the service contract.
trans-unit.target: Se recomienda que <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract> implementaciones identifican un contrato de servicio mediante el <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A> propiedad del tipo que implementa el contrato de servicio.
